src_original: sa niṣkramann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān saṃsāracārakān niṣkrāmayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 出伽藍時，願令有情出生死獄；

src_original: sa labhanadvāram udghāṭayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ lokôttareṇa jñānena nirvāṇasugatidvāram udghāṭayeyaṃ /  sa pithad evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvānāṃ sarvâpāyadvārāṇi pidadhyāṃ /
tgt_original: 若開房門，願令有情開諸善趣出世智門； 若閉房門，願令有情閉惡趣門。

src_original: sa niṣīdann evaṃ*cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān bodhimaṇḍe niṣādayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 菩薩坐時，願令有情皆得坐於妙菩提樹；

src_original: sa dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /
tgt_original: 右脇臥時，願令有情安住涅槃；

src_original: yo 'yaṃ sarvâvasthāsu satvârthaḥ //  yathā kathitaṃ câryaratnameghe /  sa tathāgatacaitye vā tathāgatavigrahe vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā dadat sarvasatvānāṃ dauḥśīlyadaurgandhyamalâpanayanāya tathāgataśīlapratilambhāya ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩若以香花奉獻如來制多及佛形像，以此迴向，令諸有情離破戒垢，得佛戒香；

src_original: sa sanmārjanôpalepanaṃ kurvan sarvasatvānām aprāsādikêryāpathavigamāya /  prāsādikêryāpathasaṃpade ca pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 菩薩又常灑掃、塗地，持此迴向，令諸有情離惡威儀，修善法式，齊整圓滿；

src_original: sa puṣpacchatram āropayan sarvasatvānāṃ sarvakleśaparidāhavigamāya pariṇāmayati /
tgt_original: 又諸菩薩奉獻花蓋，以此迴向，令諸有情捨離熱惱。

src_original: sa vihāraṃ praviśann evaṃ cittam utpādayati /  sarvasatvān nirvāṇapuraṃ praveśayeyaṃ /
tgt_original: 又彼菩薩入僧伽藍發如是心，令有情等入涅槃城；
